isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS, BUMPER AND RUNNING BOARDS - MXT - REMOVE AND INSTALL - SPLASH PANELS

svcsubproc.title: Splash Panel- Removal
svcsubproc.para: The splash panels (Figures 20-23) on the MXT minimize splash and mud, protecting vital engine systems from corrosion and malfunction.

para.title: Splash Panel Removal: Passenger Side Forward

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 20 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Tilt the hood assembly (Item 1) forward and locate the four splash panel mounting bolts (Item 2) at the forward section of the hood (Item 1).
Remove the four mounting bolts (Item 2) from the hood (Item 1).

figure.caption: Figure 20. Splash Panel - Passenger Side Forward Shown

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. PASSENGER SIDE FORWARD SPLASH PANEL MOUNTING BOLTS

para.title: Splash Panel Removal - Passenger Side Rear

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 21 for Items in parentheses.

item.para: With the hood still tilted forward, locate the four splash panel mounting bolts (Item 1).
Remove three mounting bolts (Item 1) from the rear splash panel (Item 2) and the two splash panel brackets (Item 3).
Remove the remaining mounting bolt (Item 1) from the panel (Item 2) and the fender extension (Item 4).
Remove the splash panel (Item 2).

figure.caption: Figure 21. Splash Panel (Passenger Side Rear Shown)

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. PASSENGER SIDE REAR SPLASH PANEL BRACKETS

para.title: Splash Panel Removal - Driver Side Forward

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 22 for Items in parentheses.

item.para: Tilt the hood (Item 1) forward and locate the five Driver side forward mounting bolts (Item 2).
Remove the five mounting bolts (Item 2) from the driver side forward splash panel (Item 3).
Remove the splash panel (Item 3).

figure.caption: Figure 22. Splash Panel (Driver Side Forward Shown)

para.title: Splash Panel Removal - Driver Side Rear

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 23 for Items in parentheses.

item.para: With the hood still tilted forward, locate the three splash panel mounting bolts (Item 2).
Remove two mounting bolts (Item 2) from the Driver side rear splash panel (Item 1) and fender extension (Item 3).
Remove the remaining mounting bolt (Item 2) from the rear splash panel (Item 1) and mounting bracket (Item 4).

figure.caption: Figure 23. Splash Panel (Driver Side Rear Shown)

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. DRIVER SIDE REAR SPLASH PANEL MOUNTING BOLTS

svcsubproc.title: Splash Panel - Installation

para.title: Splash Panel Installation: Passenger Side Forward

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 20 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Locate the four forward splash panel mounting bolt holes in the hood and align the forward splash panel (Item 3) with the holes.
Insert the mounting bolts (Item 2) through the splash panel (Item 3) and into the mounting bolt holes in the hood.
Do not tighten bolts at this time

para.title: Splash Panel Installation: Passenger Side Rear

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 21 for Items in parentheses.

item.para: Locate the four mounting bolt holes in the two splash panel brackets (Item 3) and the fender extension (Item 4) and align the rear splash panel (Item 2) with the holes.
Insert the mounting bolts (Item 1) through the splash panel (Item 2) and into the mounting bolt holes in the fender extension (Item 4) and splash panel brackets (Item 3).
Do not tighten bolts at this time.

para.title: Splash Panel Installation: Driver Side Forward

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 22 for Items in parentheses.

item.para: Locate the five mounting holes for the forward splash panel (Item 3) in the hood (Item 1).
Insert the five mounting bolts (Item 2) through splash panel (Item 3) and into the mounting bolt holes in the hood (Item 1).
Do not tighten bolts at this time.

para.title: Splash Panel Installation: Driver Side Rear

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 23 for Items in parentheses.

item.para: Locate the three mounting holes for the rear splash panel (Item 1) in the fender extension (Item 3) and mounting bracket (Item 4).
Insert the three mounting bolts (Item 2) through the splash panel (Item 1) and into the fender extension (Item 3) and mounting bracket (Item 4).
Tighten all sixteen bolts to the required torque.
Close hood and lock hood latch.
